verses.verse: <S%G1899>Then<s%> <S%G1223>after<s%> a period of <S%G1180>fourteen<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> I went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas,<s%> <S%G4838>taking<s%> <S%G5103>Titus<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> with <S%G4838>me.<s%>

to <S%G3739>whom<s%> we gave no <S%G1502>place<s%> in the way of <S%G5292>subjection,<s%> <S%G3761>not<s%> <S%G4314>for<s%> an <S%G5610>hour,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> of the Good <S%G2098>News<s%> might <S%G1265>continue<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%>

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> they <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G3716>walk<s%> <S%G3716>uprightly<s%> according <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> of the Good <S%G2098>News,<s%> I <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> them <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G1487>"If<s%> <S%G4771>you,<s%> <S%G5225>being<s%> a <S%G2453>Jew,<s%> <S%G2198>live<s%> as the <S%G1483>Gentiles<s%> <S%G2532>do,<s%> and <S%G3756>not<s%> as the <S%G2452>Jews<s%> <S%G5101>do,<s%> why do <S%G315>you<s%> compel the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> to live as the Jews <S%G2450>do?<s%>

yet <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1344>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1437>but<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> we might be <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3551>law,<s%> because <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G1344>will<s%> be <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1360>by<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3551>law.<s%>
